seed_pair.target: When did you start to learn?

S0074: muchas gracias | por ayudarme | ayudarme a comprender | por ayudarme a comprender
thank you very much | for helping me | helping me to understand | for helping me to understand
S0075: tienes | más que aprender | tienes más que aprender
have you got / do you have | more to learn | have you got more to learn
S0076: estoy muy feliz | muy feliz | feliz con | cuánto he aprendido | he aprendido | ya
I'm very happy | very happy | happy with | how much I've learnt | I've learnt | already
S0077: estoy sorprendido de | lo rápidamente que | estoy comenzando a | comenzando a comprender | comprender
I'm surprised at | how quickly | I'm starting to | starting to understand | understand
S0078: no comprendo | lo que dijiste | no comprendo lo que dijiste
I don't understand | what you said | I don't understand what you said
